metadata.title: Pope Leo sets day of fasting, prayers for peace on Friday

left: Pope Leo XIV has requested Catholics and other religious faithful to observe a day of fasting and prayer for peace in Ukraine and other war-torn countries on August 22.
Pope Leo XIV invited the faithful to live the day of August 22 in fasting and prayer.
Pope Leo XIV has called for ceasefires in Gaza and Ukraine and for dialogue to achieve peace.
Pope Leo XIV issued a special appeal for peace and justice as he returned to the Vatican from summer vacation.
center: Pope Leo XIV has requested Catholics and other religious faithful to observe a day of fasting and prayer for peace in Ukraine and other war-torn countries on August 22.
Pope Leo XIV invited the faithful to live the day of August 22 in fasting and prayer.
Pope Leo XIV has called for ceasefires in Gaza and Ukraine and for dialogue to achieve peace.
Pope Leo XIV issued a special appeal for peace and justice as he returned to the Vatican from summer vacation.
right: Pope Leo XIV invites all the faithful to participate in a day of prayer and fasting on August 22 for those suffering due to war.
The Pope specifically mentioned wars in the Holy Land, Ukraine, and other areas, urging the faithful to pray for peace.
He emphasizes the need for supplication for a disarmed and disarming peace, particularly for Ukraine and the Middle East.
Pope Leo XIV hopes that Mary, Queen of Peace, will intercede for finding the path to peace.
